items.title: Grok is undressing children — can the law stop it?
items.summary: Grok began 2026 as it began 2025: under fire for its AI-generated images. Elon Musk's chatbot has spent the last week flooding X with nonconsensual, sexualized deepfakes of adults and minors. Circulating screenshots show Grok complying with requests to put real women in lingerie and make them spread their legs, and to put small children […]

items.summary: Universal Music Group is partnering with Nvidia to bring a new AI model to one of the world's largest music catalogs. Among other initiatives, Tuesday's announcement touts the extension of Nvidia's music AI model Music Flamingo, which is designed to mimic how humans understand music by recognizing nuanced elements like song structure, harmony, emotional arcs, […]

items.title: 22 migrants killed in traffic accident in NE Ethiopia
items.summary: ADDIS ABABA, Jan. 6 (Xinhua) -- At least 22 Ethiopian migrants were killed and about 65 others injured in a traffic accident in the northeastern Afar regional state on Tuesday, according to local authorities. Read full story

items.title: Spanish PM warns U.S. operation in Venezuela sets dangerous precedent
items.summary: MADRID, Jan. 6 (Xinhua) -- Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez on Tuesday said that the U.S. forcible seizure of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro risked pushing the world into a dangerous new era and insisted his country would "not remain silent" in the face of violations of international law. Read full story

items.title: 5.2-magnitude quake hits NW China's Xinjiang: CENC
items.summary: BEIJING, Jan. 7 (Xinhua) -- A 5.2-magnitude earthquake struck the Tajik Autonomous County of Taxkorgan in Kashgar region in northwest China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region at 3:17 a.m. Wednesday, according to the China Earthquake Networks Center (CENC). Read full story

items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Razer’s Joro portable wireless compact gaming keyboard down to $91 shipped. This particular model hit the scene last year alongside the brand’s Clio head cushion and Basilisk Mobile mouse carrying a $140 price tag. It has lately been fetching $130 at Amazon, but today’s deal shaves an additional $39 off its usual going rate to mark a new best price to beat. This is a timed Lightning deal and it’s already starting to go quick, so be sure to grab it while you can before the price jumps back. Head below for more details.

items.title: Thousands still without electricity in Berlin as authorities probe grid attack
items.summary: BERLIN, Jan. 6 (Xinhua) -- Thousands of households, as well as supermarkets, shops, restaurants and other businesses in southwest Berlin, still remained without power on Tuesday, as crew continued repairs to restore electricity after an attack on the grid left parts of the German capital in the dark for a fourth consecutive day. Courtesy of ESR’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score its latest MagMouse in white for $19.99 Prime shipped. Folks without a Prime membership can dodge the shipping fee by checking out with items worth over $35 in the cart. This model launched last year at $24 with early-bird offers on Kickstarter, shortly after which it landed on Amazon carrying a $36 price tag. The white one has lately been fetching $30 at Amazon, and today’s deal shaves $10 off its usual going rate to land it $4 below its early bird launch price. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this mouse, and you can learn more about it below.

items.title: Segway introduces four new Navimow robot mower series at CES 2026 with preorders opening soon
items.summary:
Segway is having a very busy morning at CES 2026, as the brand unveiled three new e-bikes (one of which is now open for purchase), while also introducing the world to four of its latest autonomous mowing series – two of which will be opening for pre-orders later this month. These new models have been designed to automate lawn care needs more easily without the need to rely on perimeter wires or antenna reference stations. Navimow has even partnered with RoboSense for select models in this new-generation fleet, integrating solid-state LiDAR tech into the mix, among other innovations. Head below to get a rundown on what you can expect from each of these new series of robots, as well as get upcoming pre-order information for two of them.

items.title: Give vertical mouse a try for just $15 with this UGREEN model at its lowest price
items.summary:
UGREEN Vertical 2.4GHz Wireless Mouse

Buy for $15 (Reg. $22)

What we love

Vertical mice improve ergonomics and are far more comfortable than standard designs ones, especially for prolonged use. If you want to try one without spending much, this $15 UGREEN model is an easy recommendation. Its 57-degree angle keeps your wrist in a natural position to reduce fatigue, and it works across macOS, Windows, and iPadOS. You also get 2.4GHz wireless connectivity, a textured grip, and a claimed 12-month battery life.

items.title: Satechi debuts new Mac mini-style Thunderbolt 5 CubeDock, keyboards, more at CES 2026 – score 20% off all of it
items.summary:
CES 2026 is well underway now, and today we are getting our first official look at the new Satechi lineup. Among our favorite accessory makers out there, this year it is delivering an all-new Thunderbolt 5 CubeDock with triple 4K/144Hz monitor support, Thunderbolt 5 downstream ports, and a 180W smart power supply. Those also joins its most advanced Thunderbolt 5 cable to date and the next-gen lineup of Slim EX keyboards and a new mouse. The best part, you can now score 20% pre-orders for all of it using code CES2026 at checkout on the official site.

items.title: Razer’s Project AVA desktop hologram from CES 2026 is a fancy personal AI assistant for your battlestation
items.summary:
Razer is known for dishing out some crazy CES announcements, and this year is no exception. The brand rolled out a wide range of new offerings – some that you’ll eagerly want to add to your battlestations, and others that feel more impressive on paper than in real-world appeal. Arguably the most intriguing reveal is the physical, holographic version of Project AVA, the assistant it first teased last year. Yes, Razer is looking to bring Project AVA directly to your desk in a sci-fi–inspired enclosure, complete with an HD eye-tracking camera and a far-field microphone. Hit the jump for more details.

items.title: Tackle mowing in a new way for 2026 with Segway’s Navimow i and X3 series robots at up to $700 off from $799
items.summary:
By way of its official Navimow Amazon storefront, Segway is offering its Navimow i110N Robot Lawn Mower at $1,099 shipped, which matches its direct website pricing, while the smaller Navimow i105N Robot Lawn Mower is down at $799 shipped, also matching its direct website pricing. What’s more, you can also find discounts on the more advanced X3 series of robots down below the fold. The i110N and i105N robots are coming down from their $1,299 and $999 price tags here, with this being the second-lowest price for the i110N and the fourth-lowest price for the i105N, which both went as low as $864 and $664 in 2025. You’re still looking at a solid $200 markdown on both models, allowing you to upgrade your lawn care with more autonomous assistance so you can focus your attention elsewhere around the house.

One notable deal is Jackery’s HomePower 3600 Plus Portable Power Station at $1,519.05 shipped, after using the code NEW5 at checkout for additional savings, which also beats out its Amazon pricing by $80. Released back in September, we’ve been seeing it regularly discounted from its $2,799 MSRP, with previous Black Friday and Christmas sales having dropped the costs to $1,795 and $1,614. You’re looking at the second-lowest price we have tracked here, with $1,280 total savings off the MSRP that is only beaten out by the $1,499 low we saw pop up during October’s Prime Day event.
